mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, password, name, email, role, nickname) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{role}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, name, email, role, profile_img, nickname, created_at FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password, name, email, role, profile_img, nickname, created_at FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, name, email, role, profile_img, nickname, created_at FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, username, password, name, email, role, profile_img, nickname, created_at FROM member ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
